urls.title: USCIS Temporarily Suspends Biometrics Requirement for Certain Form I-539 Applicants
urls.description: Effective May 17, 2021, U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services will temporarily suspend the biometrics submission requirement for certain applicants filing

text: This suspension will go into effect on May 17, 2021 and will apply through May 17, 2023. To learn more, visit: https://t.co/nLL94gAiDi

We understand the impact this has on the lives of those affected and in an effort to remove unnecessary burdens and ease the backlog we’ve temporarily suspended the biometrics submission requirement for certain H-4, L-2, & E nonimmigrant applicants.

The impact of COVID-19 on our services has created an unprecedented backlog of cases related to Form I-539, which is particularly impacting H-4, L-2, and certain E nonimmigrants, and their related Form I-765, Application for Employment Authorization.
